bookAuthors: Mark Twain, Guy Cardwell, John Seelye, Walter Trier
plot: A nineteenth-century boy from a Mississippi River town recounts his adventures as he travels down the river with a runaway slave, encountering a family involved in a feud, two scoundrels pretending to be royalty, and Tom Sawyer's aunt who mistakes him for Tom.
characters: Huckleberry Finn, Tom Sawyer, Jim Upton, Mark Twain, Tom Sawyer, Jim Upton
setting: United States of America St. Petersburg, Missouri Hannibal, Missouri Missouri Mississippi River
